#summary The map name attribute
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute,from-w3c

== Usage ==

== Values ==

== Elements ==

You can use the `name` attribute on the following elements:

  * [AElement <a>]
  * [AppletElement <applet>]
  * [ButtonElement <button>]
  * [EmbedElement <embed>]
  * [FormElement <form>]
  * [FrameElement <frame>]
  * [FramesetElement <frameset>]
  * [IframeElement <iframe>]
  * [IlayerElement <ilayer>]
  * [ImgElement <img>]
  * [KeygenElement <keygen>]
  * [LayerElement <layer>]
  * [LinkElement <link>]
  * [MapElement <map>]
  * [MetaElement <meta>]
  * [ObjectElement <object>]
  * [ParamElement <param>]
  * [RtElement <rt>]
  * [RubyElement <ruby>]
  * [SelectElement <select>]
  * [TextareaElement <textarea>]

== Browser compatibility ==

|| *Test* || *IE8* || *IE7* || *FF3* || *FF2* || *Saf3* ||
